title: International motor insurance (Green Card)
dataVerified: Policyholder name, vehicle, covered countries, insurer, policy number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake Green Cards (EU cross-border motor insurance). Domain binding verifies insurer. Border crossing verification. Required for driving in non-EU countries. Prevents uninsured cross-border accident liability.
